name: ICON Worldwide AG
description:
We are an independent, Design & Technology agency based in Zürich and Sofia, with offices in Madrid, Bahrain and New York City.  We design, build and run digital businesses for some of the worlds most demanding companies.  Our clients are global leaders, active around the world.  We work with innovative start ups positioning them for long term success.
Design and development is done 100% in-house with zero outsourcing.  We believe clients are sophisticated in digital and benefit from sitting together with a project team including designers and developers.  Our developer team works across all technologies including Durpal, Wordpress, iOS and Android.
We love new technologies and are actively working on the tomorrow's topics today, including AI, Machine Learning, Internet of Things, Block Chain and Cyber Security.
